name: The One I Gave My Heart To
lyric:
汪佩蓉 - The One I Gave My Heart To
作曲：Diane Warren 填词：Aaliyah 专辑：只要你快乐

How could the one I gave my heart to
Break my heart so bad
How could the one who made me happy
Make me feel so sad
Won't somebody tell me
So I can understand
If you loved me
How could you hurt this heart of mine
Tell me (yeah yeah)
How could you be so cold to me
When I gave you everything
All my love all had inside
How could you just walk out the door
How could you not love me anymore
I thought we had forever
I can't understand
How could the one I shared my dreams with
Take my dreams from me
How could the love that brought such pleasue
Bring such misery
Somebody tell me please
How could you do that to me
Tell me, Hey hey yeah yeah yeah
Can't understand
No I can't understand
How could the I gave my heart to
How could you hurt me like that
How could the one gave my world to
Throw my world away
How could the one who said I love you
Say the things you say
How could the one I was so true to
Just tell me lies
Tell me (tell me, tell me)
Tell me
lyric_extra:
文本歌词最后由 Jeremy_Chung2011 编辑于2019-09-11 15:04
